header_text: Last month, you accepted an offer to take on extra responsibilities at work for a pay increase. However, this has caused you to spend much less time on other important areas of your life, like family and friends. You talk with your supervisor and make a plan to reduce your responsibilities slightly, making you feel relieved.

elements.Text: Will your job continue to take up all of your time?
